title: Username taken prevents progress until changed to available
description: Verifies the onboarding flow blocks progression when a username is taken and allows progression after choosing an available username.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Change taken username to available and proceed to personal details section
description: Verifies that after a taken username error, changing to an available username enables the next onboarding step.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Type a different unique value into the "Username" field

title: Plan selection is required before continuing to payment
description: Verifies the user must select a plan (Starter/Pro/Business) before proceeding to the payment continuation step.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Click the "Start Trial / Continue to Payment" button

title: Public storefront loads and shows creator bio + social links
description: Verifies a public creator storefront page renders and key profile elements are visible without login.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Verify element "Social links section" is visible.

title: Switch product layout from Grid to List and confirm change
description: Verifies shoppers can switch between Grid and List layouts in the products section.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Verify element "Grid layout option" is visible.

title: Open a published product from product card and view product detail modal/drawer
description: Verifies clicking a product card opens a visible product detail view (modal or drawer).

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Click on a product card that is labeled as available/published.
Verify element "Product detail modal or drawer" is visible.

title: Start checkout from product detail using Buy Now
description: Verifies the Buy Now call-to-action initiates the checkout flow from the public storefront.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Click on a product card that is labeled as available/published.

title: Unpublished product card shows Coming Soon or not available message
description: Verifies selecting an unavailable/unpublished product results in a clear 'Coming soon' or not available state.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL that includes at least one unpublished/unavailable product card.
Click on a product card that is labeled as unavailable/unpublished (or otherwise indicated as not for sale).
Verify element "Buy Now" is not visible.

title: Unpublished product returns 404/not available when opened directly via in-page interaction
description: Verifies the UI provides a 404 or product-not-available message when an unavailable product cannot be opened.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL that includes at least one product card known to be unpublished/unavailable.
Click on a product card that is known to be unpublished/unavailable.

title: Products section is reachable and contains at least one product card
description: Verifies the products area renders product cards and is discoverable via scrolling.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Verify element "Grid layout option" is visible.

title: Product detail view can be dismissed without breaking storefront browsing
description: Verifies users can close the product detail modal/drawer and continue viewing the product list.

steps.description: Navigate to a known creator storefront URL (for example, the QA test creator’s public page).
Click on a product card that is labeled as available/published.
Verify element "Product detail modal or drawer" is visible.
Click on "Close" (or "X") in the product detail view.
Verify element "Product detail modal or drawer" is not visible.

title: Save theme colors from Theme tab and see success confirmation
description: Verifies a creator can change primary and background colors in the storefront editor and successfully save changes.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Save after changing both primary and background colors shows changes saved
description: Verifies saving after making multiple color changes shows a visible confirmation that changes were saved.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Verify Upload background image control is visible without performing upload
description: Verifies the storefront editor exposes the background image upload entry point (without using file upload).

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Verify text "Upload background image" is visible

title: Verify Save button is present on storefront customization page
description: Verifies the storefront customization page provides a visible Save control to persist changes.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Create and publish a new digital product (without file upload)
description: Verifies a creator can create and publish a product and see it appear in the product grid/list.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Type "E2E Test Product" into the product name field
Type "A product created by an end-to-end UI test." into the product description field
Select "Digital product" from the product type dropdown
Verify text "E2E Test Product" is visible

title: Validate required fields prevent publishing a product
description: Verifies the publish action is blocked and validation messaging is shown when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Cancel out of product creation without publishing
description: Verifies a creator can exit the create-product flow and the product is not added to the list.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Type "E2E Draft Product" into the product name field
Verify text "E2E Draft Product" is not visible

title: Edit an existing product and verify updates appear in the product list
description: Verifies a creator can open an existing product, update fields, save/publish changes, and see updates reflected in the UI.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field
Click on the first product in the product list
Type " (Updated)" into the product name field

title: Attempt to save order without any reorder changes
description: Verifies saving order with no changes either remains disabled or shows no-op feedback without error.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the email or username field

title: Checkout email validation blocks proceeding to payment when email is empty
description: Verifies the checkout form requires an email before allowing the buyer to proceed to payment.

steps.description: Navigate to the public storefront page for a test creator (a valid /u/[username] page prepared with at least one purchasable product).
Verify a visible validation message is shown indicating email is required.

title: Checkout email validation blocks proceeding to payment when email is invalid format
description: Verifies invalid email formats are rejected and the buyer cannot proceed to payment.

steps.description: Navigate to the public storefront page for a test creator (a valid /u/[username] page prepared with at least one purchasable product).
Verify a visible validation message is shown indicating the email is invalid.

title: Buyer can return to checkout after a failed/cancelled payment and try again
description: Verifies the UI provides a visible path to retry payment from the failure state.

steps.description: Navigate to the public storefront page for a test creator (a valid /u/[username] page prepared with at least one purchasable product).
Verify text "Proceed to payment" is visible.
Verify the email field is visible.

title: Start trial from onboarding and reach Razorpay mandate step
description: Verifies a creator can select a plan in onboarding and initiate the Start Trial flow up to the Razorpay mandate UI.

steps.description: Click the "Start Trial" button for a visible plan

title: Billing page shows current subscription state details
description: Verifies the billing UI displays a clear subscription state (trialing/active/cancelled/past due) for the logged-in creator.

steps.description: Click the "Billing" button or link on the dashboard (if present)

title: Admin can view webhook logs in admin panel
description: Verifies an authenticated admin can access the admin panel and see webhook log-related UI content.

title: Create an AutoDM follow-first rule and verify it appears in the rules list
description: Verifies a creator can create a follow-first AutoDM rule from the dashboard and see it listed.

title: Save a newly created follow-first rule and verify success feedback
description: Verifies saving a follow-first AutoDM rule shows visible confirmation and returns to a state where rules can be reviewed.

title: Validation: prevent saving a rule when keyword/trigger is empty
description: Verifies the UI blocks saving and shows a visible validation error when required trigger input is missing.

title: Cancel rule creation returns to rules list without adding a rule
description: Verifies cancelling out of the create rule flow returns to the list view and no new rule is visibly added.

title: Toggle follow-first on/off in the create rule form updates visible state
description: Verifies the follow-first control can be toggled and the UI reflects the selected state.

steps.description: Verify text "Follow-first enabled" or "On" is visible

title: Editing surface is reachable from dashboard without using direct URL navigation after login
description: Verifies the user can reach the AutoDM hub via in-app navigation from the main dashboard.

steps.description: Verify element "Dashboard" overview content is visible
Verify page title contains "AutoDM" or "AutoDM Hub"

title: Admin can suspend a creator user from Users list
description: Verifies an admin can find a creator in the Users list and suspend the account with visible suspended status afterward.

steps.description: Click the "Users" tab or menu item
Type "test" into the user search field
Verify element "Users list results" is visible
Click the "Suspend" button for the first visible user in the results
Click the "Confirm" button in the suspend confirmation dialog
Verify text "Suspended" is visible for that user in the list

title: Admin cancels suspend action and user remains active
description: Verifies cancelling the suspend confirmation does not change the user status to suspended.

steps.description: Click the "Users" tab or menu item
Type "test" into the user search field
Verify element "Users list results" is visible
Click the "Suspend" button for the first visible user in the results
Click the "Cancel" button in the suspend confirmation dialog
Verify text "Suspended" is not visible for that user in the list

title: Admin searches for a creator and sees filtered results
description: Verifies the Users search filters the visible list to match a query.

steps.description: Click the "Users" tab or menu item
Type "creator" into the user search field
Verify element "Users list results" is visible
Verify text "creator" is visible within the users list area

title: Admin edits a plan price and sees successful sync confirmation
description: Verifies an admin can change a plan price, save it, and see a visible success confirmation for the sync.

steps.description: Click the "Plans" tab or menu item
Click the "Edit" button for the first visible plan
Verify text "Price sync successful" is visible

title: Admin attempts to save an invalid plan price and sees validation error
description: Verifies the UI prevents saving an invalid price and displays a visible error message.

steps.description: Click the "Plans" tab or menu item
Click the "Edit" button for the first visible plan

title: Admin opens Webhooks list and views a webhook entry details
description: Verifies an admin can navigate to Webhooks and open a webhook entry to view details.

steps.description: Click the "Webhooks" tab or menu item
Click the first webhook entry in the list

title: Admin reprocesses a webhook and sees invalid signature error when applicable
description: Verifies reprocessing a webhook shows an 'Invalid signature' error and does not show a success confirmation when the signature is invalid.

steps.description: Click the "Webhooks" tab or menu item
Click the first webhook entry in the list
Verify text "Reprocess successful" is not visible

title: Admin panel navigation shows Users, Plans, and Webhooks sections
description: Verifies the admin can access core sections from the Admin panel and each section renders a visible header.

steps.description: Click the "Users" tab or menu item
Click the "Plans" tab or menu item
Click the "Webhooks" tab or menu item
